inputFormat:
The first line contains a single integer $ t $ ( $ 1 \le t \le 10 $ ) — the number of test cases.

Each of the next $ t $ lines contains a single integer $ n $ ( $ 2 \le n \le 100 $ ) — the required size of a square.
outputFormat: For each test case print $ n $ lines, each containing $ n $ integers — the prime square you built. If there are multiple answers, print any.
translation:
定义一个$n\times n$素数正方形为:
- 所有的数不大于$10^5$
- 所有的数不是质数
- 每行、每列的和都是质数

输入$n$，输出大小为$n$的素数正方形

翻译 by jun头吉吉
